name: MDNS_Generic
keywords: Communication, mDNS, Ethernet, EthernetLarge, Arduino, Teensy, SAMD21, SAMD51, SAM DUE, AVR, Mega, nRF52, W5100, W5200, W5500, Ethernet shield
description: mDNS Library for nRF52, SAMD21, SAMD51, SAM DUE, STM32F/L/H/G/WB/MP1, AVR Mega, etc. boards using Ethernet W5x00. Supports mDNS (Registering Services) and DNS-SD (Service Discovery)
